channel.title: Spawning help
channel.description:
hello im currently new to making these kind of stuff, and i think i only have 8 percent knowledge of it. so heres my problem i hae download this blank source and right now i have added npc and done alot of things thanks to the help of this forums but when it comes to adding custom items, i havw a problem, you see this custom items has 5 digit code and the server gives me error that i cant spawn it and i have to edit my character in the wsource folder to get the following item, so my problem is I CANT SPAWN 5 DIGIT ITEMS
anyone help me please im really new, would appreciate it if you can help me

item.title: Spawning help
item.dc:creator: @polkaman polkaman
item.description:
@polkaman wrote:

I’m a bit new to this, but go into your commands.java and search for this:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) {

Under that somewhere it should say

if ((newItemID <= NUMBER) && (newItemID >= 0)) {

Make the NUMBER in that code something like 50000 or your highest item id. hope I helped

Read full topic
